content: --व्याज {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} candid, upright, honest, plain. {2} without fraud, true, genuine. {3} got by heroism or daring deeds (not by fraud or cowardly conduct); <ls>Māl. 5. 12.</ls> {4} not hypocritical; <ls>Bh. 2. 82.</ls> (--जं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} plainly, honestly, candidly; <ls>Amaru. 79.</ls>
